content: if you ve been searching for the perfect crochet gift item this washcloth fits the bill i made several sets for gifting and have used them myself - they are truly wonderful the border gives the dishcloth the structure it needs to keep its shape better than other knit and crochet cloths this pdf pattern includes 3 full color photo tutorials finished measurements after light blocking 7 5 w x 7 5 h or 19cm x 19cm supplies * g 4 25mm hook or hook to meet gauge * approx 65 yards or one skein of a worsted weight cotton yarn such as dishie from wecrochet * scissors * tapestry needle * measuring tape gauge 14 5 sts x 12 5 row in 4 x 4 to check your gauge make a swatch chain 17 follow the cloth instructions for a total of 15 row measure your swatch excluding the first and last row and the sts at the edges if your swatch is too big or too small try a different hook
